comment:
['









  
  
    ', '
  I purchased this laptop with upgraded RAM (32GB) and SSD (1TB).  It arrived near May 15, 2019.  The fan died this morning June 26, 2020 only one year and 6 weeks from when I purchased the laptop.  The warranty is for 3yr and 1yr.  When I ran diagnostics it said the warranty started in 2018 and ended December of 2019.  Dell wanted to charge me for support.  When I asked to escalate (chat) to a supervisor, they said no one was working until the weekday.', 'I have been buying Dell laptops for 20 years for work and never has anything broken within the first year.  In fact, I usually buy the cheapest ones and change them every 2 years.  This is the first time I purchased a more expensive one, thinking it would last AT LEAST AS LONG AS THE $500 laptop.', 'Nor have I ever had a support person blow me off like this...
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', "
  The item came promptly. From the beginning the touch screen didn't work. But I could live with that. But when I went to take a class and couldn't hear!!!! A message popped up that there was no sound card. Now they won't issue a refund and are saying it's Amazon's responsibility. Getting the royal run around.
", '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  It has already had issues that require repair beyond the in-house IT guy.
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', "
  Came in evening around 11pm so in thankful USPS was still working. But had a few scratches on the outside as if it has been used. But I'm greatly in need of a good computer and so far it's working terrific and fast. The touch screen of course doesn't really have any use unless I am feeling lazy about using the mouse but this computer is great. But please Amazon or Dell, send a brand new computer without scratches on top of it because I would have put a 5 Star if It came brand new. Buyers beware...
", '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  This laptop was ok for the price. Lack of USB-C is a problem, especially now that the power connector is broken, not sure if it is the adapter or on the board. In any case, expected better from Dell, this is close to HP quality (this is not a compliment)
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  I ordered new and recurved used one I will return it
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', "
  I have had this laptop for about a month and a half and I love it. It boots up in seconds. Multitasking is super fast (simultaneously downloading several files while listening to iTunes and working on spreadsheets didn't slow this machine one bit) and it has loads of memory space. Although I generally don't use the touchscreen feature, it is kind of cool. The fingerprint reader works perfectly. You will be hard pressed to find a comparable laptop at anywhere close to this price. I also bought the Laplink PCmover software from Amazon which made it a fast and seamless transfer.
", '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  Product arrived damaged and not working. Seller refuses to fix or replace and is blaming me for damage. Beware of purchasing from Brown Box seller!
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  This is not the touch screen as advertised. Nothing about this item is as advertised!!!! Could not even connect it the internet. SO NOT COOL!!!!!! Never again, and I have been dealing with Amazon for years, and this is one of the worst experiences I have encountered. My son is crushed!!!!!
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', "
  Laptop randomly shut itself off and would not restart. Worked fine otherwise. When I finally had enough and contacted Dell the warranty had expired in February 2019 (I purchased in Oct 2019). I was promised a brand new laptop, not someone's used reject.
", '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', "
  So what do you give a sister who cooks, cleans, takes out the trash, and loves FaceBook?  A NEW LAPTOP!!!  I bought this laptop for the specs.  The laptop has gobbs of memory and enough hard drive space for millions of pictures.  I hope she likes it!!!  I'm pretty sure that she will love it.
", '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  Although the picture shows black keyboard, we received gray. Not a big deal to most, but this was for my parents, who have a difficult time seeing the gray. Was not as advertised.
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  So far, after a few weeks of use, we are loving this laptop! I spent a LOT of time researching to get a laptop within our budget, that ran really well. This one checks off all the boxes! Speed, memory, sound and screen are all great! Very happy with our choice! We use this for personal and business use.
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  Laptop feels cheap. Keys are super small and backlight makes them very hard to see. Trackpad is horrible - it flexes and is hypersensitive to the point it’s almost unusable. Set up was easy with the Onboard Dell AI assistant. Fan is a bit loud per other reviews and the machine does run hot. Touchscreen is actually decent and works well. Speakers get buzzy even at medium volume (played a few music videos from YT).  Due to the annoying trackpad and poor sound quality, not sure if I will keep or return.', 'Update:  System failure (hardware/BIOS) that prevents use. Must return to Dell. Really bad. Never again, Dell!!
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  I bought this computer because I was looking for a computer for my wife that had: a SSD, at least 16Gb of ram and at least a i5 processor. Also my wife feels more comfortable working on Windows.', 'This one was a good balance between price and specs. It looks a lot like a Macbook Pro, but it feels a little more fragile than a Mac.  She also liked that this one had a full keyboard including the numbers keypad.', "The Touchscreen in a thing like a laptop is something that I feel that is useless. It doesn't respond as well as a modern cellphone does.", 'We  were looking for a laptop with SSD, but this one also had an internal HDD of 1Tb, which is useful for storing all the data that are not critical to access. That was something nice that we found.
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  This computer has proven to be fast and just what I needed. Set-up was easy and it moves at lightening speed!
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  Servers it purpose for a field Superintentent
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  Not only is this hunk of junk not working,  I found out that the warranty runs out in November 2020.  Just received on July 28, 2020.  Would have been nice to put that in your product explanation.
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  Bought 2 of these for my grown up children. They absolutely love this computer very happy.
', '
  
']

', '
  
']

    ', '
  Great little computer!
', '
  
']

    ', '
  Ad offered a new machine. Machine delivered is used. Warranty expires on Dec 24 two days from now!
', '

    ', '
  Good computer for a good price
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', "
  Laptop is amazing , it's fast and display is good. We can definitely recommend to students and for office purposes.
", '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  Not sure at this time if the touch screen is worthy of the extra cost!
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  Only thing I don’t like is even with turning on keyboard light, which has to be continually pressed, difficult to see characters on keys.
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', "
  It cannot open the system to the desktop when it is first used, and its warranty time is also wrong. I bought the computer in January 2020, but the warranty list shows that its warranty period can only reach November 2020. I I seriously suspect that this computer has been used. I tried to contact the seller and ask why? But he didn't reply to me any information.
", '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  When i tried to start the computer the first time it said "No Bootable Item".  I go to Dell.com/support and find out the warranty expired 26 Jun 2019.  I ordered the computer in January on 2020.  Avoid this product and seller at all cost.  TOTAL RIP OFF!!!!!!
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  Overall good laptop for casual  use.  I am not a fan of the backlit keyboard because it can be difficult to see the keys sometimes.  I would recommend this laptop to anyone looking for a fast, easy to use solution for shopping, reading, and reasearch.
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  This laptop have been giving my son significant issues especially with the battery. Mere weeks after purchasing the laptop it will not work unless it is plugged in. My son has his school assignment and is having nightmares trying to complete an assignment. He tried to persist with it but working with a laptop that does not give you a good half hour after powering up something is wrong. Some letters on the keyboard stick when you press them and do type.', 'As a parent and the one that purchase this laptop I know that I have disadvantage my son and feel very responsible for this inadequate purchase on my part.
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  I bought this model at $800 realizing it isn’t on the high or low end of the spectrum when it comes to buying a laptop, but I’ve already sent this unit in twice for repairs and it looks like I’m going to have to send it again. I’m not saying anything negative about the customer service which is why I’m giving 2 stars because they’ve been nothing but kind and have assisted me greatly. But to send in a unit three times for repair within three months and cost $800?! Save your money and look for a different unit.
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', "
  This laptop is used by my wife and replaces her older 2016 Dell Inspiron 15 3000 3552 laptop.  She enjoys the speed, feel of the keyboard and the touchscreen display.  Haven't heard of any complaints, only praise.
", '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  This review is being written by a non techie person.', 'Good memory, well lit screen, easy use.  I use this laptop', 'for email and publisher.  Works well.  The laptop is', 'heavier then you might like if you carry your laptop', 'often.  It is fine for me as I rarely take it off my desk at', 'home. I thought the price was very good for the capabilities', 'It has.
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  All good with the laptop ecxept for the ethernet speed, the specifications said gigabit ethernet port, but it max up at 100mbps download. I spoke to Dell support tech and i tried everything to get it over 100mbps but no luck. I was able to get the wifi speed over 200mbps but still low based on my 600mbps internet service.
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  The boot time is pretty long. After 30 mins of moderate usage I started getting "not responding" errors. Load time for applications was surprisingly long. The typing on the keyboard was laggy, just out of the box. I would not recommend this laptop for any more than light surfing and streaming.', 'The seller is awesome though. I would buy from them any time.
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', "
  I am a software developer and have been using some memory intensive programs and needed an upgrade. I have been extremely happy with this machine from the second it came out of the box. Boot speed is incredible with the SSD, I timed my bootup from completely off is about 12 seconds. I am running a data heavy node application, heavy development server, VScode, spotify, and about 10 tabs on google chrome and this thing isn't even breaking a sweat. With mentioned programs I'm still using a little less than half the memory and barely utilizing the cpu. I did a ton of research and this was the absolute best bang for the buck I could find, and would buy again in a heartbeat.", 'Only flaws -', "Screen is OKAY. I wasn't buying this machine for the screen but I have seen laptops in the price range with better displays.", 'Why is this thing touchscreen? Literally no need.
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  I bought this laptop for personal home use. Mainly internet searching / surfing and using Microsoft Office. I do not have many hours on the machine yet. I bought it configured with extra RAM and a SSD for fast boot, speedy and quiet operation. Overall the machine seems to boot quick and run fast. My one negative is that this Dell has a VERY loud fan that cycles on and off. With no optical drive, I wonder what the chip set is doing to generate enough heat to make the fan run.
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  We purchased this laptop for my college-bound engineering student. Price was good, and we like Dell and have another Inspiron with an SSD, but not one that also has a 1t hard drive. We are surprised at how loud the fan is but would still recommend this laptop.
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  It came poorly packed and not usable as the screen was too dark even at the highest setting. Ten minutes in, an error message that the hard drive needs to be scanned for errors. Scan completed showed multiple system errors. Asked for a replacement 9 days ago and return was approved, still being processed... my daughter needs a laptop for school and we have nothing after spending $700.00.
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  runs really fast and you can turn the back lit keyboard on or off with F10.  nice screen plenty of ports and dvd drive. shuts down quick this one I have is silver instead of just black. low heat with the computer . nice sized screen very comfortable
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', "
  Great laptop.  Very fast and quiet.  Not sure where people say the fan is too load because we can't hear anything.  The only reason I gave it a 4 star is because I was on the phone with Dell for two hours trying to resolve the hard drive issue.  The 1 TB was not showing up on the laptop.  After several transfers from Dell, the right person was able to activate the 1 TB drive.  Everything else was in working order.
", '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  So far, this looks to be the best laptop that I have ever owned. Very fast using M.2 solid state drive for OS and 1 TB HDD for storage. The description says "no optical drive", but mine came with a DVD-RW drive. Did I receive the wrong model? The only negative is no C port, but that is just a small negative.
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', "
  I have been scammed out of my money by DELL, the most dishonest and incompetent laptop PC manufacturer in the whole world! After 3 weeks I'd bought it here on Amazon, its FAN started to be so NOISY that it could be heard all over my house and could NOT be stopped in any way! By then, one month had gone by and I could no longer return this LEMON. I called Dell, they took the PC, changed the fan, and ... surprise! After just A FEW HOURS, the TRUCK NOISE from the fan returned, even LOUDER than before!! I wanna throw this bird out of the window! I curse you DELL people, you are thieves, you have stolen my hard-earned MONEY, and SHAME ON AMAZON for not taking this LEMON BACK!! I HAVE BEEN SCAMMED OUT OF MY MONEY, may God annihilate Dell and Amazon.
", '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', "
  I was looking to replace a 7 year old laptop that seen better days...I looked for months on and off . I add this one to my list because it matched the dimensions of the old laptop with some upgrades and minus other stuff i don't need anymore.  Just like everyone else I was pleased with a new laptop. I had an issue with with Tag # not matching what the software was showing. I called Dell to see what the issue was. The Agent informed me that the laptop was upgrade by an authorized vendor , they forgot to update the Tag # to show it's been upgraded. The Agent then proceeded to tell me the upgrades bumped the cost of the unit from 3 00 to $400 higher than the base unit. I went on Dells website to price it out and he was right ! I got way more than what I paid for it !!!! I have no complaints with the unit aside from the battery life.
", '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  Product sold as used. But the announcement said as new. When I received the product, I tried to find out how long I would have to guarantee. Unfortunately I was informed by the service code. That the guarantee had already expired.
', '
  
']

['









  
    ', '
  Muy buen equipo, pero el que recibí aparentemente tiene problema con la memoria ram, pues al instalar un programa nuevo, o exigirle al equipo, el Windows se tranca y sale una pantalla azul de error. Luego del reinicio se autoresuelve, pero resulta algo incómodo que te suceda frecuentemente
', '
  
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  I was so excited when I ordered my new Dell!  I've bought 3 previous Dells and absolutely LOVED them.  After doing due diligence on different models, etc. I settled on this one.  It was a good price and I trusted Dell.  Literally, from the time I plugged it in and pushed the start button, NOTHING HAPPENED.  I waited about  15 minutes, thinking maybe it just needed to be plugged in awhile. It DID turn on, but then it was just a black screen.  I waited and waited.  I finally looked at the clock,  and after 4 minutes 38 seconds, I did get up and functioning.  But really I figured  from the time I turned it on, till it finally came on, it probably about 8 minutes!!  This was replacing my "old" Dell Latitude E5450, which I have owned for over 5 years.  I wanted a new, FAST computer.  This is NOT what I  got.  It took forever for a site to load.  When I tried to close down a page, I'd click on the X and wait, and wait and wait.  Let me say this, I use my laptop for keeping touch with friends/family, research recipes, couponing, sharing photos.  I DO NOT DOWNLOAD GAMES, STREAM VIDEOS, OR DOWNLOAD MUSIC.  I don't watch tv shows.  I just wanted a fast computer!  I tried deleting all the "bloat hardware", but it didn't help.  I love the touch screen, screen size, battery life.  But this is running like crap.  I'm going to return it.
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', "
  I was going to return this at first because I thought I just had to have a brand new computer and didn't notice it was a used laptop. I had contacted the seller and everything about returning it, they said I could no problem. But when I got it I decided to check it out. I am glad I did. I got everything I wanted in a very good laptop for less than I would have spent for a brand new one. It was in brand new condition too. No scratches or anything. My wireless mouse didn't work in one of the ports, but does work in the others on the opposite site which actually worked out better. The touchscreen comes in handy too at times. Recorded sound quality is good. The recording video quality could have been a bit better, but all in all I am very pleased with this laptop.
", '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', "
  Literally the only thing I would say about this laptop is that I wish the touchscreen was just a little more responsive. Don't get me wrong, it's still a great touchscreen, I just wish it registered the touches just a little more accurately. Other than that, the laptop is super fast and I haven't had any issues. I was a little hesitant to by a Dell, because I thought gaming brands like ASUS might be better constructed, but going forward I will definitely consider Dell!! This has been the best laptop I've owned so far.
", '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', "
  I wish I didn't waste money buying the budget Acer/Asus models first. This is my 3rd laptop in as many months and finally an excellent one!
", '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', "
  Wasn't planning on buying a labtop, but had to if I wanted to work from home. Found this one after a long search, and it came a day early. I like it so far, and I'm usually not a fan of DELL. The only thing is mine came with a CD/DVD drive which I don't mind at all. The laptop looked brand new no scratches ect. It also had the extra ram I picked and bigger hard drive.
", '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', "
  The bootup is quite fast, exceeds my last laptop hands down.  I don't use the touch screen at all, so I didn't rate it.  Really seems like overkill on this machine.  I would have given it a 5 star rating except it does NOT have as USB C connection.  I was going to hook it up to a docking station but didn't realize that it did not have that capability.  I guess I should have looked closer.  Other users have complained about fan noise.  I do not have any issues with the fan.  Only occasionally can I even hear it.  I have been a Dell user for many years now and I have also had several other brands of laptops, but Dell is my preferred laptop.
", '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', '
  Speed is OK. Screen is lower end quality bad contrast washed out. I received a used unit not new as listed, Laptop works correctly after some updates were applied. Perhaps as like new should have been in the description.
', '
  
']

    ', '

', '

", '

    ', '

    ', '
  After about 2.5 months of using this laptop, I started to get the "Blue screen of death" error messages. Contacted the seller and got no response. It turned out that the the third-party extra memory that was added to the original Dell laptop was defective. I ended up spending more money to fix this through Dell, because it was not covered by manufacture warranty. This issue seams to be a very common with this retailer, so DON'T BUY, unless you are willing to spend extra money on a brand new laptop!
', '

    ', '
  Good day.  I live in Argentina.  I bought the product from you in February.  A friend brought it to me in March from Miami and it broke a month (in April).  I bought it from Argentina.  At first it worked well.  But one day the hard drive failed and the windows blue screen went on.  It never worked again.  How can we solve this problem?  because I consider that they sold me a failed product.', ' I am looking forward to your response.
', '
  
']

['









  
  
    ', "
  It's light enough and was slightly overheating on first use, but the speed is great and SSD flies. Right now I cant fault the PC, save that I belong to that camp that doesn't understand the need of a touch screen laptop. I think it's a waste. Nonetheless Dell delivered as expected.
", '

    ', "

['









  
  
    ', '
  I got this as a gift from my best friend.  She went all out loading it with Ram and a Sata Drive. I cannot believe how fast it is.  As soon as I hit the last digit for my password (when signing in) BOOM! It loads.  It s backlit which is a God send.  It os super slim, and lightweight.  All of my laptops have had trouble "WAITING FOR CACHE" in Chrome.  No more.  Nothing ever gets hung up.  I never wait for a page to load.  The touch pad was odd, so I went in and re-set the whole thing and I NEVER have a problem with it anymore.  I went in to taskmanager and turned off things running in the background, and did the same in Settings.  (Open Settings. Click on Privacy. Click on Background apps. Under the "Choose which apps can run in the background" section, turn off the toggle switch for the apps you want to restrict)  So these made it faster also.  I use this thing sometmes 12 hours a day and it has been a joy. I am so happy the seller made this build possible.
', '
  
']

    ', "

  Warning: Avoid all Dell products in the event that you might need to call customer support!!!!!!', 'I have an Inspiron 15 Gaming 7567 and was out of warranty when I experienced a major slow down in performance and slow wifi through just the laptop 20 Mbps download while other devices were recieving 600+ Mbps.', 'Hoping to speak with tech support, I purchased a Single Incident Support for Advanced Software Support for $99.  After submitting payment, I was never contacted by tech support.  Instead it says it would take 2 days to process eventhough prior to paying for the service they said to stay by your phone for tech to contact you right away regarding your issue.', 'I eventually solved the problem by spending 7 hours refreshing/rebooting Windows 10. Since Dell Tech did not help, I assumed I could easily get a refund for the Single Incident Support for Advanced Software Support.', 'This is where it got UGLY.  I called support line and got bounced around from deptment to deptartment having to reexplain my refund request each time.  After 30 min I thought I finally reached the right department.  The representative said they needed to put me on a short hold.  I was promptley hung up on. After calling back, it took over 2 HOURS for them to process a refund. All the while repeating my first experience between departments.  After 1 1/2 hours into the call I thought I was seriously being Punked.  Exaserbating this horrible experience was a definiite communication breakdown.  Support agents that I spoke with are difficult to understand.  Dell Tech support is completely overseas and it is not possible to speak to someone were English language is their first language.  Awful, awful, awful experience! Avoid!!!! Buyer beware!!!!  Your device will need support at some time.  You were forewarned!!!
', '

    ', "
  The screen quality is very good, especially for gaming and movies. Keypad and mouse has a good feel it. Typing noise is a little noticeable even if to type softly. The 15.6-inch size is very good for multi-window working which is good for work or class note-taking. The only thing that does make me regret buying this laptop is the noise that the fan makes when it overheats. If you are doing anything big on the laptop, it will come to overheating quicker, thus will trigger the epic fan noise. This can be a distraction in a quite environment such as library or classroom. As well, battery life will go down quickly if you do big things such as gaming or streaming a movie. With a cable charger its all good! It's okay/goodish laptop.
", '
